# Flipbook Dependencies

This directory bundles browser dependencies required by the report flipbook preview.

- `jquery.min.js` — jQuery 3.7.1 (MIT License) from https://code.jquery.com
- `turn.min.js` — Turn.js 4.1.0 (GPL/MIT dual license) from https://www.turnjs.com/
- `pdf.min.js` and `pdf.worker.min.js` — Mozilla PDF.js 3.11.174 (Apache-2.0) from https://github.com/mozilla/pdf.js/

The files are vendored to ensure the preview works without relying on external CDNs.
